title: Neon Heist: The Arasaka Job
description: Infiltrate a megacorp tower to steal valuable data. Stealth, hacking, and quick thinking required.

scenes.name: Corporate Lobby
scenes.description: Gleaming chrome and neon. Corporate drones shuffle past security checkpoints.

scenes.description: Multiple elevators lead to different tower levels. Security cameras sweep the area.

scenes.name: Data Center
scenes.description: Rows of servers humming with data. This is the prize.

items.name: Encrypted Data Chip
items.description: The payload. Billions in corporate secrets.

npcs.name: Corp Security

npcs.description: Deadly AI defense program. Will fry your brain if you're not careful.
